page.title: 03The Fremington Landscape.
page.content: The area around us stretches from Penhill to Heanton Court and to Yelland power station and includes Chivenor airfield. In Fremington there is a quay on the estuary and a school. In Yelland there is a power station and a holiday camp called 'Lagoon' but there is no school. The land is very flat. The water down near the quay is polluted and you cannot drtink it or swim in it. In Fremington there is an old manor house which is now converted to an old peoples home and nearby ther is an army camp. There is a football club that play every week at the park and there are shops, apost office, a supermarket and a garage. There are two areas of woodland.
